Centuries of basking in the enchanted sunlight has left its russet fur with a strange warm sheen and an unnatural resilience to heat.

If made afraid, it may become angry!}} ==Useful Info== '''Ancient bears''' are the strongest bears found in the game. Like all bears, when near death they often go [[berserk]], enhancing their damage output tremendously. While they hit hard normally, they are stronger than [[stone giant]]s when berserk. Coupled with significant [[HP]] and [[fire resistance|rF+]], they can often survive long enough to get some heavy hits in. They can be found in the [[Enchanted Forest]]. ==Spells== {{Spellcaster |number= |slot1=''none'' |slot2=''none'' |slot3=''none'' |slot4=''none'' |slot5=''none'' |slot6=[[Berserker Rage]] }} {{clear}} ==History== Ancient bears were never included in a stable release of ''Crawl''. They were considered for inclusion in [[0.14]], but with the removal of the Enchanted Forest, it was decided to remove them entirely.
